DOCNAME: CASE OF KURT AND FIRAT  v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in LOC .
CARDINAL . In DATE ORG expropriated a plot of land belonging to the applicants ( plot no . CARDINAL ) in the PERSON village , in ORG , in order to build the GPE dam .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants brought an action before ORG for additional compensation .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Instance awarded the applicants additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) plus interest at the statutory rate , running from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of the first - instance court .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the administration paid the applicants ORG DATE and ORG liras ( TRY ) respectively in additional compensation , together with interest .
